languages.text: {n}Вы сами не замечаете, как рядом оказывается Идира, которая тянет вас за рукав.{/n} "Нет, Лорд-капитан. Не надо. Не смотрите. Шепчут мне, добра от этого не будет. И вообще, лучше бы отойти вам..."

{n}Idira suddenly appears by your side and tugs at your sleeve.{/n} "Lord Captain, no. Please don't. Just don't look. The whispers say nothing good will come of it. You really should just step away from that thing..."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы сами не замечаете, как рядом оказывается Идира, которая тянет вас за рукав.{/n} "Нет, Лорд-капитан. Не надо. Не смотрите. Шепчут мне, добра от этого не будет. И вообще, лучше бы отойти вам..."

languages.text: {n}Idira apparaît soudain près de vous et tire sur votre manche.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, non. Je vous en supplie. Ne regardez pas. Les murmures disent que ça n'apportera rien de bon. Vous devriez vraiment vous éloigner de cette chose... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly appears by your side and tugs at your sleeve.{/n} "Lord Captain, no. Please don't. Just don't look. The whispers say nothing good will come of it. You really should just step away from that thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira apparaît soudain près de vous et tire sur votre manche.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, non. Je vous en supplie. Ne regardez pas. Les murmures disent que ça n'apportera rien de bon. Vous devriez vraiment vous éloigner de cette chose... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラが突然あなたのそばに現れ、袖を引っ張る。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、ダメ。お願いよ。見てはいけないの。良い結果をまねくことは決してないと噂されているわ。あんなものからは離れた方がいい…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly appears by your side and tugs at your sleeve.{/n} "Lord Captain, no. Please don't. Just don't look. The whispers say nothing good will come of it. You really should just step away from that thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラが突然あなたのそばに現れ、袖を引っ張る。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、ダメ。お願いよ。見てはいけないの。良い結果をまねくことは決してないと噂されているわ。あんなものからは離れた方がいい…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉突然出现在你身边，拽着你的袖子。{/n}“领主舰长，别这样，求你了，别看。那些小小的声音说，这么做不会有任何好结果，你真的应该离那东西远点才对……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly appears by your side and tugs at your sleeve.{/n} "Lord Captain, no. Please don't. Just don't look. The whispers say nothing good will come of it. You really should just step away from that thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉突然出现在你身边，拽着你的袖子。{/n}“领主舰长，别这样，求你了，别看。那些小小的声音说，这么做不会有任何好结果，你真的应该离那东西远点才对……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira erscheint plötzlich an deiner Seite und zupft an deinem Ärmel.{/n} "Lord Captain, nein. Bitte nicht. Seht einfach nicht hin. Die Flüsterer sagen, dass daraus nichts Gutes entstehen kann. Ihr solltet einfach von diesem Ding wegtreten ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly appears by your side and tugs at your sleeve.{/n} "Lord Captain, no. Please don't. Just don't look. The whispers say nothing good will come of it. You really should just step away from that thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira erscheint plötzlich an deiner Seite und zupft an deinem Ärmel.{/n} "Lord Captain, nein. Bitte nicht. Seht einfach nicht hin. Die Flüsterer sagen, dass daraus nichts Gutes entstehen kann. Ihr solltet einfach von diesem Ding wegtreten ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira de pronto aparece a tu lado y te tira de la manga.{/n} «Lord Capitán, no. No lo haga, por favor. No mire. Los susurros dicen que no puede pasar nada bueno. Es mejor que se aleje de esa cosa...».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly appears by your side and tugs at your sleeve.{/n} "Lord Captain, no. Please don't. Just don't look. The whispers say nothing good will come of it. You really should just step away from that thing..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira de pronto aparece a tu lado y te tira de la manga.{/n} «Lord Capitán, no. No lo haga, por favor. No mire. Los susurros dicen que no puede pasar nada bueno. Es mejor que se aleje de esa cosa...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, birden yanında belirip kolunu çekiştiriyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, yapmayın. Lütfen yapmayın. Bakmayın. Fısıltılar, neticenin habis olacağını söylüyor. O şeyden uzaklaşsanız iyi olur..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira suddenly appears by your side and tugs at your sleeve.{/n} "Lord Captain, no. Please don't. Just don't look. The whispers say nothing good will come of it. You really should just step away from that thing..."
